name: Inevitable path (itch)
description:
2067 . Earth becomes uninhabitable for humans because of the many environmental and man-made disasters and unacceptable radiation. After the next strongest catastrophe that resulted in the irreversible processes in the Earth's environment, survivors were forced to rush to move to another planet .
The relocation of people were introduced to cryogenic sleep and loaded cryogenic capsule to fly away from Earth, the spacecraft.
When you send the last space shuttle accident and a computer glitch - the result is one of the cryogenic capsule was left on Earth. After 2 years, our protagonist as a result of the case was removed from cryogenic sleep and found that because of the accident cryogenic capsule it was not loaded on the last spaceship and it is - one - has remained on Earth.
The main character was without friends , without family, but with an overwhelming desire and hope to regain it all.
The main character will find a way to fly away from a dying planet Earth.
For this he needs - to find a spaceship.
